titles: Certain elegies, done by sundrie excellent wits With satyres and epigrames.
author: Fitzgeffrey, Henry.
Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.
Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631.
Hookes, Nathaniel, fl. 1618, attributed name.
publisher: Printed by B: A[lsop]: for Miles Partriche, and are to be solde at his shoppe neare Saint Dunstons Church in Fleet-streete,
notes: Another issue, with title page cancelled and replaced with quire piA, of: Satyres: and satyricall epigrams.
In three books, each with separate title page; register continuous.
The new quire contains elegies signed by: Fr. Beau[mont], M. Dr[ayton], and N. H[ookes?].
This copy does not retain the errata leaf, G7; final leaf, G8, is blank?.
Identified as STC 7567 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
